steps.name: Given User launches the Flipkart website in respective "edge" environment
When User searches for the "Samsung S24 Ultra" in the Search bar.
Then User select the "SAMSUNG Galaxy S24 Ultra 5G (Titanium Black, 256 GB)  (12 GB RAM)" from the search results.

steps.name: And User switches the tab for the product detail page.
And User click on Add to Bag
Then User verifies that "SAMSUNG Galaxy S24 Ultra 5G (Titanium Black, 256 GB)  (12 GB RAM)" displayed in the cart.

parameters.name: productName
parameters.value: SAMSUNG Galaxy S24 Ultra 5G (Titanium Black, 256 GB)  (12 GB RAM)
